about_the_game:
Get the Artbook and feed a Cocoa!

(To access the artbook, open Rabi-Ribi and select "Artbook" inside the Rabbit Box.)

Game Art, Concept Art and Development Screenshots
100+ pages of art and screenshots covering almost everything Saiste, Waero and GemaYue have drawn for Rabi-Ribi.
Includes all character wallpaper backgrounds. (More than the 15 in the Trading Cards)

Developer Commentary
Character settings, changes in development, and artists deciding things by themselves: all featured with illustrations.

Playable Content
Boss, game modes, playable characters, and difficulties (Warning: Unstable!) that never made it to the final game.

In-Game Portrait Viewer
Now you can view and mix different characters' facial expressions. Make Saya happy again!

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or above
